languages.text: "Л-лорд-капитан? Вы в порядке? Простите... я даже не успела предупредить..." {n}Идира выглядит напуганной.{/n} "Хлопок, взвизг, радужное пятно... за секунду до того, как эта тварь... давайте просто избавимся от нее!"

"L-Lord Captain? Are you all right? Forgive me... I didn't even have the chance to warn you..." {n}Idira looks frightened.{/n} "There was a bang, a howl, a blur of colour... a second before that creature... Oh, let's just get rid of it!"
languages.original_text: "Л-лорд-капитан? Вы в порядке? Простите... я даже не успела предупредить..." {n}Идира выглядит напуганной.{/n} "Хлопок, взвизг, радужное пятно... за секунду до того, как эта тварь... давайте просто избавимся от нее!"

traits.locale_text: "L-Lord Captain? Are you all right? Forgive me... I did not even have the chance to warn you..." {n}Idira looks frightened.{/n} "There was a bang, a howl, a blur of colour... a second before that creature... Oh, let's just get rid of it!"

"L-Lord Captain? Are you all right? Forgive me... I did not even have the chance to warn you..." {n}Idira looks frightened.{/n} "There was a bang, a howl, a blur of colour... a second before that creature... Oh, let's just get rid of it!"

"L-Lord Captain? Are you all right? Forgive me... I did not even have the chance to warn you..." {n}Idira looks frightened.{/n} "There was a bang, a howl, a blur of colour... a second before that creature... Oh, let's just get rid of it!"

"L-Lord Captain? Are you all right? Forgive me... I didn't even have the chance to warn you..." {n}Idira looks frightened.{/n} "There was a bang, a howl, a blur of colour... a second before that creature... Oh, let's just get rid of it!"

languages.text: “舰……舰长大人？你还好吗？请原谅我……我都没来得及警告你……”{n}伊迪拉看起来被吓坏了。{/n}“当时‘碰’地一声，我听到了一声嚎叫，看到一大片模糊的色彩……就在那前一秒……噢，我们还是赶紧解决掉这只怪物吧！”
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain? Are you all right? Forgive me... I didn't even have the chance to warn you..." {n}Idira looks frightened.{/n} "There was a bang, a howl, a blur of colour... a second before that creature... Oh, let's just get rid of it!"

traits.locale_text: “舰……舰长大人？你还好吗？请原谅我……我都没来得及警告你……”{n}伊迪拉看起来被吓坏了。{/n}“当时‘碰’地一声，我听到了一声嚎叫，看到一大片模糊的色彩……就在那前一秒……噢，我们还是赶紧解决掉这只怪物吧！”

languages.text: «¿L-Lord Capitán? ¿Se encuentra bien? Disculpe... Ni siquiera he podido advertirle...». {n}Idira está alarmada.{/n} «Ha habido una explosión, un aullido, una nube de color... un segundo antes de que esa criatura... Oh, ¡acabemos con ella!».
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain? Are you all right? Forgive me... I didn't even have the chance to warn you..." {n}Idira looks frightened.{/n} "There was a bang, a howl, a blur of colour... a second before that creature... Oh, let's just get rid of it!"

traits.locale_text: «¿L-Lord Capitán? ¿Se encuentra bien? Disculpe... Ni siquiera he podido advertirle...». {n}Idira está alarmada.{/n} «Ha habido una explosión, un aullido, una nube de color... un segundo antes de que esa criatura... Oh, ¡acabemos con ella!».

languages.text: 「ロ、ロード・キャプテン？大丈夫なの？許して…警告する間さえなかった…」{n}イディラはおびえているようだ。{/n}「発砲音に、うめき声、にじむ色…一瞬前にあの怪物が…ああ、もう忘れさせて！」
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain? Are you all right? Forgive me... I didn't even have the chance to warn you..." {n}Idira looks frightened.{/n} "There was a bang, a howl, a blur of colour... a second before that creature... Oh, let's just get rid of it!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロ、ロード・キャプテン？大丈夫なの？許して…警告する間さえなかった…」{n}イディラはおびえているようだ。{/n}「発砲音に、うめき声、にじむ色…一瞬前にあの怪物が…ああ、もう忘れさせて！」

languages.text: « {mf|S-Seigneur-capitaine|S-Seigneure-capitaine} ? Vous allez bien ? Pardon... Je n'ai même pas eu le temps de vous avertir, {n}s'excuse Idira, qui semble effrayée.{/n} J'ai entendu un grand bruit, aperçu un fouillis de couleurs... et l'instant suivant, cette créature... Oh, débarrassons-nous-en ! »
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain? Are you all right? Forgive me... I didn't even have the chance to warn you..." {n}Idira looks frightened.{/n} "There was a bang, a howl, a blur of colour... a second before that creature... Oh, let's just get rid of it!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|S-Seigneur-capitaine|S-Seigneure-capitaine} ? Vous allez bien ? Pardon... Je n'ai même pas eu le temps de vous avertir, {n}s'excuse Idira, qui semble effrayée.{/n} J'ai entendu un grand bruit, aperçu un fouillis de couleurs... et l'instant suivant, cette créature... Oh, débarrassons-nous-en ! »

languages.text: "L-Lord Captain? Geht es Euch gut? Vergebt mir ... Ich hatte nicht einmal die Chance, Euch zu warnen ..." {n}Idira wirkt verängstigt.{/n} "Da waren ein Schlag, ein Heulen, ein Farbfleck ... eine Sekunde, bevor diese Kreatur ... Ach, wir sollten sie einfach erledigen!"
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain? Are you all right? Forgive me... I didn't even have the chance to warn you..." {n}Idira looks frightened.{/n} "There was a bang, a howl, a blur of colour... a second before that creature... Oh, let's just get rid of it!"

traits.locale_text: "L-Lord Captain? Geht es Euch gut? Vergebt mir ... Ich hatte nicht einmal die Chance, Euch zu warnen ..." {n}Idira wirkt verängstigt.{/n} "Da waren ein Schlag, ein Heulen, ein Farbfleck ... eine Sekunde, bevor diese Kreatur ... Ach, wir sollten sie einfach erledigen!"

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan? İyi misiniz? Affedin beni... Sizi uyaramadım bile..." {n}İdira korkmuş gözüküyor.{/n} "Patlama oldu, uğultu koptu, renkler aniden soldu... O yaratıktan önce... Aman, kurtulalım şundan!"
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain? Are you all right? Forgive me... I didn't even have the chance to warn you..." {n}Idira looks frightened.{/n} "There was a bang, a howl, a blur of colour... a second before that creature... Oh, let's just get rid of it!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan? İyi misiniz? Affedin beni... Sizi uyaramadım bile..." {n}İdira korkmuş gözüküyor.{/n} "Bir patlama vardı, bir uğultu, renkler aniden soldu... O yaratıktan önce... Aman, kurtulalım şundan!"
